childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
My name is Santiago Guerra, most of the time I like to code, listen to interesting talks about the latest technology and read. I am a citizen of a beautiful country called Colombia, I love everything related to technology, mathematics and programming.

Since I was little I have been a very curious person who likes to learn and is always willing to help. I met the frontend development a year ago and fell in love immediately. I want to grow and contribute in this country.

I'm someone who is passionate about what i do, every [project](#projects) that I have done I have done with a lot of love ‚ù§.
